page.title: 14Law and Order
page.content: In New Mills there is a police station near the library on Hall Street. Outside it shows posters of people who are wanted for crimes. There is a public telephone on the wall for anybody to use. If you lose something the best place to go is the police station. There is a traffic warden in New Mills and if you park on double yellow lines you have to pay a fine. Vandalism is not to bad in New Mills but there is some. Bus stations and bus stops are the worst for vandalism. Having a manned police station helps deter hooligans.
